thread.title: Friday’s Travel News and Tips
thread.title_full: Friday’s Travel News and Tips - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Friday’s Travel News and Tips
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes consumer news, deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
A NEW BOUTIQUE HOTEL IN DURHAM
Opening today, the Durham Hotel in North Carolina draws on local talents, from a celebrated chef to an indie record label, breathing new life into a former bank building downtown.
The one-time Home Savings Bank now houses 53 guest rooms that reference the building’s midcentury design roots in platform beds and retro light fixtures. The minibar is stocked with locally made goods, blankets were made by Raleigh Denim and complimentary morning coffee, delivered to the rooms, comes from local Counter Culture Coffee. In the lobby, a newsstand includes music from the local label Merge Records.
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
